Effective Date: 14/05/2025

1. Introduction

Midnight Photo values your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you contact us via our website.

2. Information We Collect

We only collect the information you voluntarily provide through the contact form:

  • Your name
  • Your email address
  • The content of your message

3. How We Use Your Information

We use this information solely to:

  • Respond to your inquiries
  • Communicate with you directly

4. Sharing Your Information

We do not sell, share, or distribute your personal information to third parties, except if required by law.

5. Data Security

We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure.

6. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access the personal data we hold about you
  • Request corrections to inaccurate information
  • Request the deletion of your data

7. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page, along with an updated effective date.
